DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effectiveness low carbohydrate diet increase dietary adherence improve cardiometabolic risk factor among adult spinal cord injury ( SCI ) . Seventy overweight/obese adult SCI randomize one two group : 1 ) reduce carbohydrate diet 2 ) : `` standard '' diet ( STD ) . Participants take part 6-month behavioral lifestyle intervention implement novel eHealth platform specially design individual SCI .
DOC.brief_title: Diet Composition Cardiometabolic Risk Reduction Adults With SCI
